files.name: drawer-content.svelte
drawer-description.svelte
files.content:
<script>import { Drawer as DrawerPrimitive } from "vaul-svelte";
import { cn } from "$lib/utils.js";
export let el = undefined;
let className = undefined;
export { className as class };
</script>

<DrawerPrimitive.Description
	bind:el
	class={cn("text-sm text-muted-foreground", className)}
	{...$$restProps}
>
	<slot />
</DrawerPrimitive.Description>

files.name: drawer-footer.svelte
drawer-header.svelte
drawer-nested.svelte
files.content:
<script>import { Drawer as DrawerPrimitive } from "vaul-svelte";
export let shouldScaleBackground = true;
export let open = false;
export let activeSnapPoint = undefined;
</script>

<DrawerPrimitive.NestedRoot {shouldScaleBackground} bind:open bind:activeSnapPoint {...$$restProps}>
	<slot />
</DrawerPrimitive.NestedRoot>
